import './App.css'; import Container from '@mui/material/Container'; import { ChakraProvider} from '@chakra-ui/react' function App() { return (
{/* add container to wrap text*/}

A Quick Study of the Olympic Games: A Comparison Between Stadium Attendance & Television Viewership

{/* add container to wrap text*/}

Purpose:

This a smple and brief anaylsis of existing data on the Olympic Games to illustrate the significant differences between stadium attendance and television viewership and visualize this raw data. This information may be used to highlight the importance for continued focus on the at-home viewer for brands and commercial advertisement.

{/* add mui container: methodology & analysis */}

Methodology:

The methodology used for the analysis of this data is fairly straightforward. average viewership comparison for most recent olympics -- excluded Tokyo Ollympics as results would've been skewed due to the low stadium attendance being an outlier due to covid protocol So Rio Olympics used instead (which interestingly enough was the last Games that got me back into running). Also limited the data to track and field only -- reviewing each event would require a larger effort (which may be something that I decide to do at another time)

Data:

{/* add mui data table and populate w/ data from Statista study */}

Analysis:

Total viewership from August 5 '(Opening Ceremony)' -- August 20 (Closing Ceremony): 100m

Average Vieweship per day: 27.5m

Total Ticket sales for Games: 6.2m

{/* add mui container: for grid w/ graphs & charts*/}

test

); } export default App;
